response.summary: I am an industrial engineer from the National University of Colombia with a master's degree in Project Management from the University of Lorraine in France. Motivated and trained to work in project management, supply chain, production and circular economy. I am dynamic, curious, responsible and committed. I am able to work in a team, under pressure and results oriented. I want to continue learning in a company that allows me to grow as a professional and as a person.
response.skills: Autonomy, Investigation, Stakeholder Management, Engineering Consulting, Project Management, Project Planning, Risk Assessment, Espíritu de equipo, Paquete de Office, Desarrollo de innovación, Francés, Espagnol, Anglais, Gestión de proyectos, Administración de la cadena de suministro, Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo, Gestión de la producción, Community Manager, Coordinación de proyectos, Lean Six Sigma

profile_positions.description:
PMO pour Airbus Operations SA Toulouse

- Support project leaders in different types of projects as PMO
- Structuring projects according different methodologies to guarantee objectives in termes of time, quality and performance.
- Documentation monitoring and reporting of projects. Ensure follow up of project actions. Identification of risks and opportunities. Creation of decision support tools.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Consultant

profile_positions.description: I mapped a remanufactured product identifying over a thousand parts, their material, weight, supplier, and more. Based on this, I made an estimate of the carbon footprint for the original and remanufactured product, showing a reduction of about 80% of the environmental impact. Finally, I made a proposal for CSR development scenarios for the company with a 3-year horizon.
profile_positions.title: Intern in circular economy

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the group's external communication: creation and management of social networks, website and marketing strategy. Oversight of the creation and use of graphic pieces and identity elements. Support coordinator for the organization of university events.
profile_positions.title: Student assistant community manager

profile_positions.description: I worked as a consultant for a large company in Bogota that wanted to measure the impact of its activities on mobility in this area of the city. Specifically, I designed and implemented a tool to collect information to characterize employees and visitors.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Research Assistant

company.name: Capgemini
company.description:
Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of 350,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2022 global revenues of €22 billion.

Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com
